attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement to stop and report after a road collision with a cat
attributes.additional_details: having to explain to your children there family pet has died at the result of a careless motorist is heartbreaking and feel the same treatment for dogs should be adopted for dogs.
attributes.background: after a recent event where a motorist had hit my family cat which was only 9months old. I learned that if some had been in a collision with a dog this becomes reportable but a cat it doesn't.
